tests.name: 03037_union_view.sql

tests.query:
CREATE VIEW broken_view as
SELECT
  t.start as start,
  t.end as end,
  cast(datediff('second', t.start, t.end) as float) as total_sec
FROM broken_table t FINAL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  null as start,
  null as end,
  null as total_sec;
tests.name: 03037_union_view.sql
